snippet: The number of homeless female veterans more than doubled from 2006 to 2010, according to a recently released government report that called for better services from the Department of Veterans Affairs.
abstract: The number of homeless female veterans more than doubled from 2006 to 2010, according to a recently released government report that called for better services from the Department of Veterans Affairs.

headline.main: Number of Homeless Female Veterans Rises Sharply, Report Finds
